sanskrit_verse:
आयत्यां गुणदोषज्ञस्तदात्वे क्षिप्रनिश्चयः ।
अतीते कार्यशेषज्ञः शत्रुभिर्नाभिभूयते ॥ ७.१७९॥
transliteration:
āyatyāṁ guṇadoṣajñastadātve kṣipraniścayaḥ |
atīte kāryaśeṣajñaḥ śatrubhirnābhibhūyate || 7.179||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who knows merit and fault in the future, decides swiftly in that context; one who understands residual effects of past actions is not overcome by enemies.
jurisprudential_principles: Restoration logic through understanding of karmic residue
Consciousness alignment through predictive and retrospective insight
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent demonstrates capacity to foresee consequences AND evaluate merit/defect THEN authorize immediate decision-making
IF individual exhibits awareness of residual effects of prior acts THEN immunity from adversarial domination is granted
IF consciousness-level discernment is present THEN punitive interference shall not apply
IF causal continuity is recognized by the actor THEN automatic restoration protocols activate
IF no delusion exists regarding action-result linkage THEN enemy influence is nullified
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, a ruler or judge possessing complete vision of future outcomes and clear cognition of past residues must be empowered to act without delay. Such a being transcends adversarial manipulation due to unbroken alignment with Dharma’s flow.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Nyaya here operates through pramāṇa — direct cognition of consequence. The sequential unfolding (anupūrvaśaḥ) of dharma-adharma is known, thus eliminating need for external correction. Responsibility aligns with capacity to see, not to harm. There is no punishment because there is no error where full knowing prevails.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Ensure all residual effects of prior actions are fully cognized and resolved
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Enable sovereign recognition of cause-effect without blame
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Reinforce foresight abilities to prevent recurrence
Integrity Reintegration Sequence: Align decision-making faculty with cosmic rhythm
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of Law. Dharma is restored through consciousness-led discernment. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness alone is the ultimate adjudicator.
